title: 63. Reparenting series- Part one, loving yourself even when it seems impossible
description:
Hey girl!
 
In this episode,  we talk about falling in love with the self love journey, how loving yourself is a destination, not a process, and meeting yourself where you are at. Tune in for so much more on this topic!
 
Click here for the 3 step guide to radical self-forgiveness e-book
 
Click here to join the no more codependent thought patterns masterclass!
 
(or visit beatricekamau.com/programs)
 
Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com
